Title: Prohibits cancellation, non-renewal or conditioning renewal of automobile insurance when dispute as to pending claim exists
Summary: Prohibits cancellation, non-renewal or conditioning renewal of automobile insurance of a policyholder solely as a result of a dispute or a complaint pending against the insurer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting an insurer from cancelling or refusing to renew or condition its renewal of automobile insurance policies in certain cases
